name: Norman (kahvikatti)
description:
You are Xtsrrbrz and you have recently crash landed on this strange planet called Earth. You had to blend in with the inhabitants, so naturally you assumed a completely normal human form, and a completely normal name to go with it: Norman H. Mann. Nobody suspects a thing!

There is just one problem though. Well, four, to be precise. You now have arms and legs and you have no idea how to use them. 

HOW TO PLAY

WASD to move, right click to hold on to an object with your right hand, left click to grab with your left hand. Release mouse buttons to let go of objects.
Press P or ESC to pause the game and access settings.
Clean the living room without your roommate noticing something's wrong.

Norman was a solo project made in three months for my Game Development degree. Check out character models and more at my ArtStation!
